text: aur tumase pahale bhee hamane bahut se paigambar bheje unamen se kuchh to aise hain jinake haalaat hamane tumase bayaan kar die, aur kuchh aise hain jinake haalaat tumase nahin doharae aur kisee paigambar kee ye majaal na thee ki khuda ke aikhteyaar die bagair koee maujiza dikha saken phir jab khuda ka hukm (azaab) aa pahuncha to theek theek phaisala kar diya gaya aur ahale baatil hee is ghaate mein rahe
